Englisch
This is a feature motion picture that consists of three tales based on particular
patients of a mental institution. Each tale begins with Dr. Stenson, the primary
physician at the Sanitarium, commenting on the recent arrival of a new patient.
As Dr. Stenson speaks, the individual's story begins. "Sanitarium" explores the
different narratives of the insane patients - tales which led to their crazed
states of minds. These accounts reflect hallucinations, imaginary voices, and
altered realities, and include themes of the paranormal, the unexplainable, and
the mystical. The motion picture features thrillers, dramas, horror, and mystery.
